<<ContentPage.BindingContext> <app:MainPageModel /> </ContentPage.BindingContext> <ContentPage.Resources> <ResourceDictionary> <Style TargetType="Label"> <Setter Property="VerticalTextAlignment" Value="Center" /> </Style> </ResourceDictionary> </ContentPage.Resources> <ScrollView Padding="8">
<Grid RowSpacing="0" ColumnSpacing="0"> <Grid.RowDefinitions> <RowDefinition Height="Auto" /> <RowDefinition Height="Auto" /> <RowDefinition Height="Auto" /> <RowDefinition Height="Auto" /> <RowDefinition Height="Auto" /> <RowDefinition Height="Auto" /> </Grid.RowDefinitions> <Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ColumnDefinition Width="1*" /> <ColumnDefinition Width="2*" /> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions>
<Label Grid.Row="0" Grid.Column="0" Text="ComboBox" /> <xfx:XfxComboBox Grid.Row="0" Grid.Column="1" Placeholder="Enter your email address" ActivePlaceholderColor="BlueViolet" ItemSelected="Email_ItemSelected" Focused="Email_OnFocused" Unfocused="Email_OnUnfocused" SelectedItem="{Binding SelectedItem}" Text="{Binding EmailAddress}" ItemsSource="{Binding EmailSuggestions}" SortingAlgorithm="{Binding SortingAlgorithm}" xfx:XfxBinding.ValidatesOnDataErrors="True"/>
<Label Grid.Row="1" Grid.Column="0" Text="Material Entry" /> <xfx:XfxEntry Grid.Row="1" Grid.Column="1" Placeholder="Enter your name" Text="{Binding Name}" xfx:XfxBinding.ValidatesOnDataErrors="True"/>
<Label Grid.Row="2" Grid.Column="0" Text="No Error Message" /> <xfx:XfxEntry Grid.Row="2" Grid.Column="1" Placeholder="Enter your name (error message won't show)" ErrorDisplay="None" Text="{Binding Name}" xfx:XfxBinding.ValidatesOnDataErrors="True"/>
<Label Grid.Row="3" Grid.Column="0" Text="No Floating Label" /> <xfx:XfxEntry Grid.Row="3" Grid.Column="1" Placeholder="This hint won't float, and it's a password entry" Text="{Binding Foo}" xfx:XfxBinding.ValidatesOnDataErrors="True" IsPassword="True" FloatingHintEnabled="False" />
<Label Grid.Row="4" Grid.Column="0" Text="Change Colors" /> <xfx:XfxEntry Grid.Row="4" Grid.Column="1" Placeholder="Change Colors" PlaceholderColor="DodgerBlue" ActivePlaceholderColor="BlueViolet" TextColor="Crimson" Text="{Binding Foo}" />
<Label Grid.Row="5" Grid.Column="0" Text="Font Sizes" /> <xfx:XfxEntry Grid.Row="5" Grid.Column="1" FontSize="10" Placeholder="Enter something "/> </Grid> </ScrollView>.../>
<<app:MainPageModel />.../>
<<ResourceDictionary> <Style TargetType="Label"> <Setter Property="VerticalTextAlignment" Value="Center" /> </Style> </ResourceDictionary>.../>
<<Style TargetType="Label"> <Setter Property="VerticalTextAlignment" Value="Center" /> </Style>.../>
<<Setter Property="VerticalTextAlignment" Value="Center" />.../>

<<Grid RowSpacing="0" ColumnSpacing="0"> <Grid.RowDefinitions> <RowDefinition Height="Auto" /> <RowDefinition Height="Auto" /> <RowDefinition Height="Auto" /> <RowDefinition Height="Auto" /> <RowDefinition Height="Auto" /> <RowDefinition Height="Auto" /> </Grid.RowDefinitions> <Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ColumnDefinition Width="1*" /> <ColumnDefinition Width="2*" /> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions>
<Label Grid.Row="0" Grid.Column="0" Text="ComboBox" /> <xfx:XfxComboBox Grid.Row="0" Grid.Column="1" Placeholder="Enter your email address" ActivePlaceholderColor="BlueViolet" ItemSelected="Email_ItemSelected" Focused="Email_OnFocused" Unfocused="Email_OnUnfocused" SelectedItem="{Binding SelectedItem}" Text="{Binding EmailAddress}" ItemsSource="{Binding EmailSuggestions}" SortingAlgorithm="{Binding SortingAlgorithm}" xfx:XfxBinding.ValidatesOnDataErrors="True"/>
<Label Grid.Row="1" Grid.Column="0" Text="Material Entry" /> <xfx:XfxEntry Grid.Row="1" Grid.Column="1" Placeholder="Enter your name" Text="{Binding Name}" xfx:XfxBinding.ValidatesOnDataErrors="True"/>
<Label Grid.Row="2" Grid.Column="0" Text="No Error Message" /> <xfx:XfxEntry Grid.Row="2" Grid.Column="1" Placeholder="Enter your name (error message won't show)" ErrorDisplay="None" Text="{Binding Name}" xfx:XfxBinding.ValidatesOnDataErrors="True"/>
<Label Grid.Row="3" Grid.Column="0" Text="No Floating Label" /> <xfx:XfxEntry Grid.Row="3" Grid.Column="1" Placeholder="This hint won't float, and it's a password entry" Text="{Binding Foo}" xfx:XfxBinding.ValidatesOnDataErrors="True" IsPassword="True" FloatingHintEnabled="False" />
<Label Grid.Row="4" Grid.Column="0" Text="Change Colors" /> <xfx:XfxEntry Grid.Row="4" Grid.Column="1" Placeholder="Change Colors" PlaceholderColor="DodgerBlue" ActivePlaceholderColor="BlueViolet" TextColor="Crimson" Text="{Binding Foo}" />
<Label Grid.Row="5" Grid.Column="0" Text="Font Sizes" /> <xfx:XfxEntry Grid.Row="5" Grid.Column="1" FontSize="10" Placeholder="Enter something "/> </Grid>.../>

<<Grid.RowDefinitions> <RowDefinition Height="Auto" /> <RowDefinition Height="Auto" /> <RowDefinition Height="Auto" /> <RowDefinition Height="Auto" /> <RowDefinition Height="Auto" /> <RowDefinition Height="Auto" /> </Grid.RowDefinitions> <Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ColumnDefinition Width="1*" /> <ColumnDefinition Width="2*" /> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <Label Grid.Row="0" Grid.Column="0" Text="ComboBox" /> <xfx:XfxComboBox Grid.Row="0" Grid.Column="1" Placeholder="Enter your email address" ActivePlaceholderColor="BlueViolet" ItemSelected="Email_ItemSelected" Focused="Email_OnFocused" Unfocused="Email_OnUnfocused" SelectedItem="{Binding SelectedItem}" Text="{Binding EmailAddress}" ItemsSource="{Binding EmailSuggestions}" SortingAlgorithm="{Binding SortingAlgorithm}" xfx:XfxBinding.ValidatesOnDataErrors="True"/> <Label Grid.Row="1" Grid.Column="0" Text="Material Entry" /> <xfx:XfxEntry Grid.Row="1" Grid.Column="1" Placeholder="Enter your name" Text="{Binding Name}" xfx:XfxBinding.ValidatesOnDataErrors="True"/> <Label Grid.Row="2" Grid.Column="0" Text="No Error Message" /> <xfx:XfxEntry Grid.Row="2" Grid.Column="1" Placeholder="Enter your name (error message won't show)" ErrorDisplay="None" Text="{Binding Name}" xfx:XfxBinding.ValidatesOnDataErrors="True"/> <Label Grid.Row="3" Grid.Column="0" Text="No Floating Label" /> <xfx:XfxEntry Grid.Row="3" Grid.Column="1" Placeholder="This hint won't float, and it's a password entry" Text="{Binding Foo}" xfx:XfxBinding.ValidatesOnDataErrors="True" IsPassword="True" FloatingHintEnabled="False" /> <Label Grid.Row="4" Grid.Column="0" Text="Change Colors" /> <xfx:XfxEntry Grid.Row="4" Grid.Column="1" Placeholder="Change Colors" PlaceholderColor="DodgerBlue" ActivePlaceholderColor="BlueViolet" TextColor="Crimson" Text="{Binding Foo}" /> <Label Grid.Row="5" Grid.Column="0" Text="Font Sizes" /> <xfx:XfxEntry Grid.Row="5" Grid.Column="1" FontSize="10" Placeholder="Enter something "/>.../>
<<RowDefinition Height="Auto" /> <RowDefinition Height="Auto" /> <RowDefinition Height="Auto" /> <RowDefinition Height="Auto" /> <RowDefinition Height="Auto" /> <RowDefinition Height="Auto" />.../>
<<ColumnDefinition Width="1*" /> <ColumnDefinition Width="2*" />.../>
/// Text . This is a bindable property. ...
/// Email Suggestions collection . This is a bindable property. ...
/// Foo summary. This is a bindable property. ...
/// Name summary. This is a bindable property. ...
/// SelectedItem summary. This is a bindable property. ...
/* note, you could use some sort of FastObservableCollection if ... */
/* clear the old suggestions, you're starting over. This also can be more efficient, ... */
/* design library 28.0.0 and later changed the field from mFocusedTextColor to focusedTextColor. ... */
/* design library 28.0.0 and later changed the field from mDefaultTextColor to defaultHintTextColor. ... */
/// Sorting Algorithm for the drop down list. This is a bindable property. ...
/// The number of characters the user must type before the dropdown is shown. This is a bindable property. ...
/// Item selected from the DropDown List. This is a bindable property. ...
/// Drop Down List Items Source. This is a bindable property. ...

<Label Grid.Row="5" Grid.Column="0" Text="Font Sizes" /> <xfx:XfxEntry Grid.Row="5" Grid.Column="1" FontSize="10" Placeholder="Enter something "/> </Grid>.../>

<<Grid.RowDefinitions> <RowDefinition Height="Auto" /> <RowDefinition Height="Auto" /> <RowDefinition Height="Auto" /> <RowDefinition Height="Auto" /> <RowDefinition Height="Auto" /> <RowDefinition Height="Auto" /> </Grid.RowDefinitions> <Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ColumnDefinition Width="1*" /> <ColumnDefinition Width="2*" /> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <Label Grid.Row="0" Grid.Column="0" Text="ComboBox" /> <xfx:XfxComboBox Grid.Row="0" Grid.Column="1" Placeholder="Enter your email address" ActivePlaceholderColor="BlueViolet" ItemSelected="Email_ItemSelected" Focused="Email_OnFocused" Unfocused="Email_OnUnfocused" SelectedItem="{Binding SelectedItem}" Text="{Binding EmailAddress}" ItemsSource="{Binding EmailSuggestions}" SortingAlgorithm="{Binding SortingAlgorithm}" xfx:XfxBinding.ValidatesOnDataErrors="True"/> <Label Grid.Row="1" Grid.Column="0" Text="Material Entry" /> <xfx:XfxEntry Grid.Row="1" Grid.Column="1" Placeholder="Enter your name" Text="{Binding Name}" xfx:XfxBinding.ValidatesOnDataErrors="True"/> <Label Grid.Row="2" Grid.Column="0" Text="No Error Message" /> <xfx:XfxEntry Grid.Row="2" Grid.Column="1" Placeholder="Enter your name (error message won't show)" ErrorDisplay="None" Text="{Binding Name}" xfx:XfxBinding.ValidatesOnDataErrors="True"/> <Label Grid.Row="3" Grid.Column="0" Text="No Floating Label" /> <xfx:XfxEntry Grid.Row="3" Grid.Column="1" Placeholder="This hint won't float, and it's a password entry" Text="{Binding Foo}" xfx:XfxBinding.ValidatesOnDataErrors="True" IsPassword="True" FloatingHintEnabled="False" /> <Label Grid.Row="4" Grid.Column="0" Text="Change Colors" /> <xfx:XfxEntry Grid.Row="4" Grid.Column="1" Placeholder="Change Colors" PlaceholderColor="DodgerBlue" ActivePlaceholderColor="BlueViolet" TextColor="Crimson" Text="{Binding Foo}" /> <Label Grid.Row="5" Grid.Column="0" Text="Font Sizes" /> <xfx:XfxEntry Grid.Row="5" Grid.Column="1" FontSize="10" Placeholder="Enter something "/>.../>
